name: Daddy, Don't Explode Me!
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 33 Compo, the theme was You Are the Monster.

Inspired by Lemmings, Minions and Dumb Ways to Day

You're an evil lord who must control their minions on a mission that will not end well for some.

You can turn the minions into bomb, fire and ice.
Bomb can blow up some stuff (boulders), fire can burn other stuff (ice and grass), and ice just creates an obstacle.

Control with mouse. Camera with mouse or WASD/arrows
